data.eml:eml: Revision of the Neotropical Stiletto Fly Genus Notiothereva Metz & Irwin (Diptera: Therevidae: Therevinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Webb, Donald W. (2005): Revision of the Neotropical Stiletto Fly Genus Notiothereva Metz & Irwin (Diptera: Therevidae: Therevinae). Zootaxa 1059: 1-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170152
